string.text:
The Baikal MP-155 is a semi-automatic shotgun with a 750mm smoothbore barrel. It began production in 2011 and is a popular choice among Russian hunters. This version, likely smuggled into the zone, has been upgraded with a magazine tube extension.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] Origin: %c[ui_gray_2]Russia
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[0,255,255,255] Manufacturer: %c[ui_gray_2]Izhmash
